import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { userLogin } from '../features/user/userActions' const LoginForm = () => { const { loading, error } = useSelector((state) => state.user) const dispatch = useDispatch() const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm() const submitForm = (data) => { dispatch(userLogin(data)) } return (
) } export default LoginForm
